description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nSoup-ffleyed:
This creature always has {CONDNAME_BUFF_PROFICIENT}. After an enemy {ACTION_attacks} your {RACE_Eggxotic} creatures, they are afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_CONFUSED}.
name: Mysterious Eggshell
